griffon.util

Class CollectionUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • griffon.util.CollectionUtils

  • public final class CollectionUtils
extends java.lang.Object

    Utility class that simplifies creating collections in Java.

    Creating Maps

     Map m = map()
     .e("foo", foo)
     .e("bar", bar);

    Creating Lists

     List l = list()
     .e("foo")
     .e("bar");

    Creating Maps

     Set s = set()
     .e("foo")
     .e("bar");

    Since:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    Andres Almiray

      • toProperties

        @Nonnull
public static java.util.Properties toProperties(@Nonnull
                                                         java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> map)
        Returns an adapted Map as a Properties instance.

        The Map is used live, which means changes made to it will affect the Properties instance directly.

        Parameters:
        map - the Map instance to adapt as a Properties instance
        Returns:
        a new Properties instance backed by the supplied Map.
        Since:
        2.1.0

      • toPropertiesDeep

        @Nonnull
public static java.util.Properties toPropertiesDeep(@Nonnull
                                                             java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> map)
        Creates a Properties instances based on the given Map.
        Parameters:
        map - the Map instance to convert as a Properties instance
        Returns:
        a new Properties instance based by the supplied Map.
        Since:
        2.10.0
